name: Super Meet Ball
description:
Super meet Ball is the story of two lovers playing the attraction-repulsion phenomena. You will have to manage their moves in order to help them meet each other.
5 levels of increasing difficulty are available.
Sounds & Musics are not made by us and are free to use.
All other assets are made by us in 72h.
Softwares used: Photoshop, Unity3D

CONTROLS:

Q/Left Mouse: Push character 1
W/Right Mouse: Push character 2
Both Buttons: Attract both characters

You will quickly understand the power of love between them !

We had 5 more CONTRAINTS picked from a deck of contraint-cards :
1) "It's alive : the game must be different every session played and must include a procedurally generated component"
How we dealt with it : The plants in the back of game are randomly generated

2)"Left Brain, Right Brain : The game must require the player to control a minimum of 2 entities simultaneously"

3)" Where are you going : At least one entitie directed movement must be using pathfinding"
How we dealt with it : we were planning to implement an ennemy using pathfinding but did not have the time to Design it ! :)

4)"Pacifist : there must no violence and agressive behaviour depicted in the game"

5 "Stay awhile and listen : The game must feature a complete story from its beginning to its end"

THE TEAM:

We are 5 french students in MBA Video Game Management at the IIM in Paris, 1 game designer, and 1 developer, reunited by our passion for the video games and challenges.

We hope you will take as much pleasure to discover our work as we took to make it. It was an incredible week-end spent with friends on something we really love.

Cheers !
